other_title: 亜空大作戦スラングル (Japanese)
plot: In the year 2545, an experiment gone wrong puts test pilot David Jance through the center of the galaxy and into another universe, which ends up in the middle of life and death struggle against the armies of GRIP, led by Dark Star.
opening_theme: "Aku Dai-Sakusen no Theme" by Keiichi Katagiri (eps 1-26)
ending_theme: "Love is More (Ai ni Mezame)" by Nanami Yagihara (eps 1-27)
